name: AdverseChildhoodExperiencesACE
title: Adverse Childhood Experiences  ACE
description: Person's  experience of  adverse childhod experiences.  (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Adverse Childhood Experiences  ACE .),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an person's  experience of  adverse childhod experiences. .),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Adverse Childhood Experiences  ACE .),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Adverse Childhood Experiences  ACE .)

contains.display: Did you live with anyone who was depressed, mentally ill, or suicidal--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
Did you live with anyone who was a problem drinker or alcoholic--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
Did you live with anyone who used illegal street drugs or who abused prescription medications--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
Did you live with anyone who served time or was sentenced to serve time in a prison, jail, or other correctional facility--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
Were your parents separated or divorced--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
How often did your parents or adults in your home ever slap, hit, kick, punch or beat each other up--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
Before age 18, how often did a parent or adult in your home ever hit, beat, kick, or physically hurt you in any way--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
How often did a parent or adult in your home ever swear at you, insult you, or put you down--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
How often did anyone at least 5 years older than you or an adult, ever touch you sexually--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
How often did anyone at least 5 years older than you or an adult, try to make you touch sexually--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]
How often did anyone at least 5 years older than you or an adult, force you to have sex--before 18 years old [ACE.BRFSS]

Total score [ACE.BRFSS]
